name: Soldier's Syringe
description: Increase attack speed. Classic starter item and easy stack for most survivors.

name: Hopoo Feather
description: Gain an extra jump. Great mobility pick that stacks well with parkour-focused survivors.

name: 57 Leaf Clover
description: Luck bending: reroll most random effects in your favor. A must-have late game.

name: Titanic Knurl
description: Boost health and regen. Boss/planet drop template for defensive stacking.

name: Shaped Glass
description: Double damage, halve health. Lunar risk-reward template entry.

name: Plasma Shrimp
description: Replace primary with homing missiles when shielded. Void corruption template.

name: Field Ration
description: Placeholder for meal-type orange drops. Swap this with your own meal entry.

name: Preon Accumulator
description: Fire a devastating electric orb. Template for standard equipment (active items).

name: Effigy of Grief
description: Create a slowing, armor-shredding zone. Template for lunar equipment.

name: Ifrit's Distinction
description: Become an overloading elite variant. Template for elite equipment drops.
